Mailbox Lock

Absolute Address:
Base Offset:
0x0
Size:
0x4

Description

Mailbox lock register for mailbox access, reading 0 will set the lock
Caliptra Access: RO
SOC Access: RO

Contents

Bits Identifier Access Reset Decoded Name
[31:1] - - - -
[0] lock r, rset 0x0 -

Field Descriptions

lock

Property Value
resetsignal ^.^.cptra_rst_b
